item.title: 2018 Review
item.description: 2018 in Review Investment in software by solution providers Advanced soltuions to solve DC challenges Businesses defining where they want to play in a mature Amazon world 2019 Outlook Next productivity jump driven by software functionality Clients leveraging a more complex network node structure Existing with Amazon
